Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Oxidative cyclization of 1 in the presence of iron(III) chloride carried out in diluted dichloromethane ( DCM ) solution yielded a dark purple benzodithiophene-4,5-diketone ( 2 ) crystal.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| ------------- |
| oxidative cyclization |
| 1 |
| presence of iron(III) chloride |
| diluted dichloromethane (DCM) solution |
| yielded |
| a dark purple benzodithiophene-4,5-diketone (2) |
| crystal |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| ------------- |
| oxidative cyclization of 1 |
| presence of iron(III) chloride |
| diluted dichloromethane (DCM) solution |
| yield of a dark purple benzodithiophene-4,5-diketone (2) |

Note: "carried out" and "yielded" are not material properties, but rather actions or processes that occurred. "Crystal" is a material property, but it describes the state of the product (benzodithiophene-4,5-diketone (2)), so it is included in the table.
